name: Kinesis (Pol Vega, Victor Lopez, cachodragon, Natàlia Puig, Alan Elwood - Games, escaleno)
name_original: Kinesis (Pol Vega, Victor Lopez, cachodragon, Natàlia Puig, Alan Elwood - Games, escaleno)
description:
1970. A man wakes up in a rural cabin in the middle of a snowstorm with a patterned  routine... that's slowly going to get tense.

Kinesis is an Interactive Narrative Thriller, where you'll find yourself in an unknown space and have to interact with your surroundings to figure out who you are, what you're doing there, and what’s going on. However, getting nervous is not in your best interest... or is it?

Don’t Let It Out
Controls

Use WASD to move the character and move the Mouse to look around.

Press E to interact.

The team

ArtVictor LópezNatàlia PuigDesignAlan ElwoodJoan CuchCodeRicard CabezasPol VegaSoundOleg Tyutyunnukov
Developed with Unity and FMOD in 2 weeks for the #summerslowjams.
